SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM admin_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.admin_id = #{adminId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id

SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM role_menu_relation rmr LEFT JOIN menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE rmr.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id

SELECT r.id id, r.create_time createTime, r.name name, r.url url, r.description description, r.category_id categoryId FROM role_resource_relation rrr LEFT JOIN menu r ON rrr.resource_id = r.id WHERE rrr.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.id
SELECT role_id FROM role WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM admin_role_relation WHERE admin_id = #{adminId})
